title.value: Distinct Social Behavior and Inter-Brain Connectivity in Dyads with autistic individuals.
title.justification: This is the title of the paper as indicated in the provided text.
title.quote: Title: Distinct Social Behavior and Inter-Brain Connectivity in Dyads with autistic individuals.

extractions.description: This paper investigates the differences in social behavior and inter-brain connectivity between dyads with typically developing (TD) participants and mixed dyads with both Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) and TD participants. It employs kinematics and EEG-hyperscanning to analyze social imitation tasks.

type.justification: The study involves experimental procedures, data collection, and analysis to compare behavior and inter-brain dynamics.
type.quote: This paper compared the behavior and inter-brain dynamics of dyads made up of two typically developing (TD) participants with mixed dyads made up of ASD and TD participants during social imitation tasks.

name.justification: The study focuses on social behavior, inter-brain dynamics, and uses hyperscanning techniques, which are central to social neuroscience.
name.quote: The study's findings suggest the importance of studying interpersonal phenomena in dynamic and ecological settings and using hyperscanning methods to capture inter-brain dynamics during actual social interactions.

name.justification: The study specifically aims to understand social behavior and inter-brain connectivity in individuals with autism.
name.quote: Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) is defined by distinctive socio-cognitive behaviors that deviate from typical patterns.

name.justification: The study investigates the neural mechanisms underlying social interactions, a primary focus of cognitive neuroscience.
name.quote: Hyperscanning provides a novel perspective on ASD, by capturing the neural activity during actual social interactions rather than in isolated contexts.

name.justification: MNE-Python is explicitly mentioned as a library used for data analysis in the study.
name.quote: We then converted the EEG data from Matlab to Python and used the MNE-Python library (Gramfort et al., 2013) for further analyses and statistics on the EEG data.

referenced_paper_title.value: MEG and EEG data analysis with MNE-Python
referenced_paper_title.justification: This is the reference provided in the context where MNE-Python is introduced.
referenced_paper_title.quote: We then converted the EEG data from Matlab to Python and used the MNE-Python library (Gramfort et al., 2013) for further analyses and statistics on the EEG data.
